author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-4455: Prepared statement failure with CLOB: Stream has already been read and end-of-file reached and cannot be re-used.
Don't materialize streams when transferring data values from one statement to another.
The code causing the bug was/is only invoked when using XA.

author: rickhall
msg: It compiles, now let the debugging commence.
